content: Jesus Warns and Comforts His Disciples
The Work of the Holy Spirit
Then  of His disciples said among themselves, “What is this that He says to us, ; and, ?”
They said therefore, “What is this that He says, ? We do not know what He is saying.”
Now Jesus knew that they desired to ask Him, and He said to them,
Jesus Christ Has Overcome the World
His disciples said to Him, “See, now You are speaking plainly, and using no figure of speech!
Now we are sure that You know all things, and have no need that anyone should question You. By this we believe that You came forth from God.”
